item.title: TimeSeries
item.author: loan.gauchat@hotmail.com (Loan Gauchat)
item.description: TimeSeries are a sequence of observations over a certain period. Insight gainable from time series: How a variable changes over time or how it depends on the change in the value of other variable(s). Terms: Univariate time series consists of the values taken by a single variable at periodic time instance over a period. Before working with time series make sure that : The time series is equally spaced There are no redundant values or gaps in it.
item.dc:creator: Loan Gauchat

item.title: Mushcognition
item.author: loan.gauchat@hotmail.com (Loan Gauchat)
item.description: In this project, The objective is to build a script that can identify a mushroom and tell us if it is edible, unedible or poisonous. First data needs to be gathered. To do so the website http://www.mushroom.world will be used as it contains an extensive database of mushrooms and their characteristics. As the database is not downloadable the website will be scraped. 1st Step: Get the data To scrap the website the python librairy Beautifulsoup will be used.
item.dc:creator: Loan Gauchat
